name: WERM
description: Werm is a skill based multiplayer betting game inspired by Snake. Players compete in fast paced, real time arenas using on-chain tokens. Before each match, everyone deposits tokens that are at stake. If you die, you drop yours. Kill another player to collect theirs, or leave anytime to secure your winnings. Built on Base, Werm combines gaming, competition, and crypto rewards in one addictive experience.
